duas: O Allah, guide me to the straight path.
O Allah, grant me patience and strength.
O Allah, forgive my sins and accept my good deeds.
O Allah, make me grateful to You, mindful of You, full of fear towards You, devoted to You, humble before You.
O Allah, I seek refuge in You from anxiety and grief.
O Allah, I seek refuge in You from incapacity and laziness.
O Allah, I seek refuge in You from cowardice and miserliness.
O Allah, I seek refuge in You from being overwhelmed by debt and overpowered by men.
O Allah, make the beginning of this day good, the middle prosperous, and the end successful.
O Allah, by You we enter the morning and by You we enter the evening, by You we live and die and to You is the resurrection.
O Allah, I ask You for knowledge that is beneficial, provision that is wholesome, and deeds that are acceptable.
O Allah, protect me from what I fear and from what I am afraid of.
O Allah, suffice me with what You have made lawful against what You have made unlawful, and make me independent of all others besides You.
O Allah, grant me love for You and love for those who love You, and love for every action that will bring me closer to You.
O Allah, I seek refuge in You from knowledge that does not benefit, from a heart that does not fear, from a soul that is not satisfied, and from a supplication that is not answered.
O Allah, purify my heart from hypocrisy, my actions from showing off, my tongue from lies, and my eyes from betrayal.
O Allah, I ask You for the best of this world and the best of the Hereafter.
O Allah, make us among those who repent, purify themselves, and are Your righteous servants.
O Allah, grant us good in this world and good in the Hereafter, and save us from the torment of the Fire.
O Allah, make the Quran the spring of my heart, the light of my chest, the remover of my sadness, and the reliever of my anxiety.
O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the punishment of the grave, from the trials of life and death, and from the evil of the False Messiah.
O Allah, grant me wellness in my religion, my worldly life, my family, and my wealth.
O Allah, cover my faults, calm my fears, protect me from my front, behind, right, left, and above, and I seek refuge in Your greatness from being taken from below.
O Allah, make me content with what You have provided me, send blessings for me therein, and compensate me with something better for what You have deprived me of.
O Allah, help me to remember You, thank You, and worship You properly.
O Allah, I ask You for steadfastness in faith and determination in guidance.
O Allah, I ask You for beneficial knowledge, good provision, and acceptable deeds.
O Allah, beautify my character as You have beautified my creation.
O Allah, I seek refuge in You from poverty, scarcity, and humiliation, and I seek refuge in You from oppressing and being oppressed.
O Allah, grant me health in my body, sight in my eyes, hearing in my ears, and strength in my limbs.
O Allah, I seek refuge in You from laziness, senility, debt, and sin.
O Allah, make me love faith and beautify it in my heart, and make me hate disbelief, transgression, and disobedience.
O Allah, I ask You for guidance, piety, chastity, and independence.
O Allah, I ask You for pardon and wellness in my religion, my worldly affairs, my family, and my wealth.
O Allah, strengthen my faith, expand my sustenance, make me of the rightly guided, and protect me from all evil.
O Allah, I ask You for Paradise and seek refuge in You from the Fire.
O Allah, make me among those who remember You often, thank You much, obey You, and humble themselves before You.
O Allah, grant me success in this world and the next, and save me from the punishment of the grave and Hellfire.
O Allah, unite our hearts, reconcile between us, guide us to paths of peace, and save us from darkness into light.
O Allah, bless our Prophet Muhammad and his family and companions, and grant them peace.
